creator: zarin@dscn.net
text:
Newest versions of coreutils require the -n flag for head and tail commands.
head -1 no longer works. Deprecated in favor of head -n 1.

creator: zarin@dscn.net
text:
Created attachment 10029
patched srclib/apr/build/buildcheck.sh to work with new coreutils
adding PatchAvailable keyword so this PR stands out more
creator: trawick@apache.org

text:
Thanks for the patch: I committed a simpler change on HEAD.  

I think there were some other things in httpd which broke with the strict POSIX
environment: SuSE have a patch in their "apache2" package.
creator: jorton@redhat.com
